import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get an action run's details"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v1/actions/runs/{run_id}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This route allows you to fetch the details of an action run.<br/><br/>To learn more about action runs, check out the [documentation](https://docs.port.io/create-self-service-experiences/reflect-action-progress/).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["v1","v2"]},"in":"query","name":"version","required":false},{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","name":"run_id","description":"The identifier of the action run you want to fetch.<br/>","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
